Description:
Sales & Operation manager of a fashion e-commerce specialized in luxury designer handbags and sustainable fashion clothing. It's a full time job however can work remotely and the timings are flexible.Responsibilities & Expectations:Responsible for meeting and greeting potential clients. 
Managing the daily sales, inventory and operational reports.
Ensuring the items are well presented and kept in the warehouse.
Manage anything that might come up in relation to fashion pop-ups and day to day business needs. 
Responsible for managing the business phone and dealing with client calls and msgs.
All items are luxury designer items and will need to be handled with utmost care. 
Responsible for arranging pick-ups, deliveries, and returns of items.
Able to work in a fast paced environment.Background: Online and offline high fashion store. 
Start: Immediately 
Salary: QAR 5,000 per month. Skills
Skills:
Fluent English Speaker (Arabic is a bonus).
Sales experience in luxury goods and luxury brands. 
Ability to negotiate and deal with customers. 
Excellent in MS (Word, PowerPoint, Excel) 
Excellent communication skills. 
Well presented at all times during working hours. 
Ability to fully manage the store, the occasional pop-ups display, in addition to online and offline sales.
Minimum 2-3 years of experience in Sales and Fashion Store Management.
